ContractPaymentAgreement.name: ContractPaymentAgreement
ContractPaymentAgreement.description: Stores information about the contract payment agreement associated with a contract.

AgreementType.description: The payment type supported in the contract payment agreement.

ContractId.description: The contract associated with the contract payment agreement.

ContractPaymentAgreementKey.description: A unique key assigned to the Contract Payment Agreement record.

Description.description: The description of the contract payment agreement.

EligibleProcedureCodeList.description: The procedure codes that are covered in the contract payment agreement. This value is applicable for Capitation and Shared Savings payment type.

EndDateTime.description: The end date until when the contract payment agreement is effective.

FeeScheduleDefinitionId.description: The fee schedule definition record associated with the contract payment agreement. This value is applicable only for Fee-for-Service payment types.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

LineofBusiness.description: The line of business to which the contract payment agreement is applicable.

Name.description: The name of the contract payment agreement associated with the contract.

StandardFeeCalculationPercentage.description: The percentage of the baseline fees of the fee schedule definition that's used to calculate the negotiated fees for the Fee-for-Service payment types.

StartDateTime.description: The start date from when the contract payment agreement is effective.

Status.description: The status of the contract payment agreement.
